definition: many/much/often/a lot of/numerous/more/in excess/how (to what extent)/multi-/Taiwan pr. [duo2] when it means "how"
back of neck/item/thing/term (in a mathematical formula)/sum (of money)/classifier for principles, items, clauses, tasks, research projects etc

pinyin: duo1 xiang4 shi4 fang1 cheng2 zu3

sentences.english: Every polynomial is differentiable , and so is every rational .
sentences.chinese: 每个多项式都是可微的，而每个有理函数也是如此。

sentences.english: The algebra AQ is called a quantum polynomial algebra.
sentences.chinese: 代数AQ叫做量子多项式代数。

sentences.english: Polynomials, including relationships involving the roots of quadratic and cubic equations, the remainder theorem.
sentences.chinese: 多项式，包括二次求根，三次方程式，余部定理。

sentences.english: Only the resultant matrix is needed to solve the greatest common factor of polynomials …
sentences.chinese: 该方法仅利用结矩阵便可求得多项式的最大公因式。

sentences.english: A complete quartic polynomial consists of 15 terms.
sentences.chinese: 一个完整四次的多项式由15项组成。

sentences.english: D dissertation is concerned with the dynamics of biquadratic polynomials.
sentences.chinese: 本文主要研究双二次多项式的动力系统。

sentences.english: It is built on an algorithm that combines a polynomial transformation and triangulated irregular network (TIN) interpolation techniques.
sentences.chinese: 它融合了多项式校正和三角网插值技术。

sentences.english: Multinomial model can raise to the imitative effect.
sentences.chinese: 多项式模型可提高拟合效果。

sentences.english: The thesis mainly discuss the unimodality of independence polynomials of some graphs.
sentences.chinese: 本文主要来讨论一些图的独立多项式的单峰型性质。

sentences.english: The theorem of rank characteristics of a class of matrix polynomials and several proof methods about it is provided.
sentences.chinese: 给出了一类矩阵多项式的秩特征定理及它的多种证法。

sentences.english: This problem is polynomially solvable under a special case.
sentences.chinese: 在特殊情况下给出了一个多项式算法。

sentences.english: We reveal that the uncertain coefficients of the 2-D polytopes are of linear affine property.
sentences.chinese: 我们揭示多胞型二维多项式的系数具有线性仿射特性。

sentences.english: Objective To discuss the clinical application of polynomial curves fitting.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨多项式拟合曲线在临床中的应用。

sentences.english: Only the resultant matrix is needed to solve the greatest common factor of polynomials in this method.
sentences.chinese: 该方法仅利用结矩阵便可求得多项式的最大公因式。

sentences.english: Aim To construct explicit and polynomial solutions of ferromagnetic chain equation.
sentences.chinese: 目的构造一维无阻尼铁磁链方程的多项式精确解。

sentences.english: The third section is concerned with the limit cycles for a class of higher degree polynomial system.
sentences.chinese: 第三章讨论了一类高次多项式系统的极限环。

definition: surd (math.)/algebraic expression involving a square root or other irrationality
common factor/common divisor (of a math. expression)
